bug.author: umesh-timalsina
bug.description:
npm start fails with the following error message <denchmark-code>Error: Cannot find module 'deepforge-dev/deepforge/bin/start-worker.js' at Function.Module._resolveFilename (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:797:15) at Function.Module._load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:690:27) at Function.Module.runMain (could beinternal/modules/cjs/loader.js:1047:10) at internal/main/run_main_module.js:17:11 { code: 'MODULE_NOT_FOUND', requireStack: [] } </denchmark-code>
It is because of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepforge-dev/deepforge/blob/master/package.json#L17>https://github.com/deepforge-dev/deepforge/blob/master/package.json#L17</denchmark-link>
and function not being update for updated worker logic in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepforge-dev/deepforge/pull/1600>#1600</denchmark-link>
